name: HYPER CRUNCH
slogan: Bringing Social Media, Reputation and Digital Marketing under one roof
description:
WE MANAGE ALL YOUR SOCIAL NETWORKS AND ONLINE PRESENCE
Bringing Social Media, Reputation and Digital Marketing under one roof

jobs.title: Social Media and content manager part time Intern
jobs.description:
Mandatory previous experience in SOCIAL MEDIA
Mandatory previous facing client role

Social Media and content manager part time

We’re looking for a highly motivated and experienced Social Media and content manager part time to take ownership of a key high-value area of our business, effectively working with multiple teams involved in its success with the end goal of increasing retention and maximising revenue.


The Social Media and content manager part time will work closely with our CEO and Sales Teams, continuously reviewing and improving our processes and customer experience from acquisition through to service delivery.


You’ll need strong leadership skills and the ability to form good relationships with key stakeholders, to ensure a streamlined operation and success in this role.

Responsibilities will include:


•	Create Social media content for our clients.
•	Manage the relationships with the clients and answer their requests
•	Reviewing and improving our quality of service
•	Improving our customer experience through communication and online booking processes 
•	Identifying areas for new customer acquisition, potential new partnerships

Experience & skills required:

•	Content creation experience 
•	Project management skills including strong organization, attention to detail, and ability to coordinate and interact with cross-functional teams 
•	Experience in a digital setting 
•	Strong leadership skills 
•	Self-starter capable of working autonomously 
•	Analytical & data driven

Important bits:

•	Competitive package 
•	East London location – close to tube & bus links 
•	Free coffees & other fun perks

This is an exciting time to join an energetic, evolving company making big moves in the Media industry! If you’re interested in joining us – please send your CV & a brief intro – we look forward to hearing from you!

The Social Media and content manager part time will work closely with our CEO and Sales Teams, continuously reviewing and improving our processes and customer experience from acquisition through to service delivery.
